title: The Secrets of Magic
description: She’s stuck in one dimension, and her babies are in the other. Can a young mother save her twins before an enemy’s obsession spells doom?Amanda Covington is desperate to get back to her girls. Returning to Earth involuntarily, she’s frantic until she learns Roswell, New Mexico might hold the answer to gaining access to the parallel world. And though she knows crossing over will cost her memories, she jumps into the portal with only a self-written letter as her guide.Following her own careful instructions, she’s horrified to discover one of her daughters has been abducted. And as the sadist she escaped from plans on using the infant to satisfy his greed, Amanda vows to get her back no matter what… except she has no idea how to use her magic.Can Amanda find her missing child before she loses her forever?The Secrets of Magic is the breathtaking second book in The Chosen portal fantasy series. If you like rooting for the underdog, pulse-pounding adventure, and deadly adversaries, then you’ll love Amy Proebstel and Bethany Hall’s stunning tale.Discover The Secrets of Magic to cross the universe today!Author's Note: This book was formerly published as Inside Ascension, Book Two of the Levels of Ascension. New scenes have been added to include more adventures.
author: Amy Proebstel
